_A_TEMPLATE_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The ATemplate component is used as a universal slot for components such as AFieldset and AForm. It extends the functionality of these components by providing flexibility to display custom content using slots and passing data through properties.
_A_TEMPLATE_GROUP_FIELDSET_DESCRIPTION_: This example demonstrates how to use the template slot in the AFieldset component. One of the child elements is a template that is rendered through the template slot. In this example, a button with the text 'Aloha' is displayed inside the template.
_A_TEMPLATE_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: This example demonstrates how to use html to render HTML content inside the ATemplate component. The HTML code is safely displayed within the component.
_A_TEMPLATE_GROUP_SLOT_DESCRIPTION_: This example demonstrates how to use slot-name and options in the ATemplate component. The slot receives the options parameters, as well as all component props, which can be used to configure the displayed content.
_A_TEMPLATE_PROPS_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: HTML content that will be safely rendered inside the component.
_A_TEMPLATE_PROPS_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION_: Any data to pass into the slot.
_A_TEMPLATE_PROPS_SLOT_NAME_DESCRIPTION_: The name of the slot where the custom content will be passed.
